Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 307th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit on 6/1/2015, off Byron Serra (DET)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 5/23/2016, off Lance Whistler (STL)...
Released by San Francisco on 8/9/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 10/9/2016 to a minor league contract...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/20/2017 with a Broken Wrist, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Released by Philadelphia on 3/2/2018...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 4/16/2018 to a minor league deal...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago on 5/4/2018...
